title: Cardano exposure on Times Square
description: Most entrepreneurs are unfamiliar with the community while most ADA investors aren't motivated proposers due to a lack of global recognition
solution: Create a global buzz through an international amplifier, Times Square, via interactive DOOH campaigns to enhance awareness of Cardano.
experience: Our organization has been based in Times Square for over 12 years providing interactive DOOH ideas to marketers across the globe.
